### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE remote_work_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    policy_description TEXT,
    effective_date DATE,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)
